name: AVCaptureDevice.WhiteBalanceGains
desc: Structure containing RGB white balance gain values.

items.name: init()
items.desc: The default initializer for white balance gains.

items.name: init(redGain: Float, greenGain: Float, blueGain: Float)
items.desc: Initializes a white balance gain from its red, green, and blue gain components.

items.name: var blueGain: Float
items.desc: The blue gain component of the white balance value.

items.name: var greenGain: Float
items.desc: The green gain component of the white balance value.

items.name: var redGain: Float
items.desc: The red gain component of the white balance value.
